cat.lump.aq.textextraction.wikipedia.categories

Class ArticleTextExtractor

  • java.lang.Object
    • cat.lump.aq.textextraction.wikipedia.categories.ArticleTextExtractor

  • public class ArticleTextExtractor
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides methods to load a list of Wikipedia articles IDs and preprocess them.
    Author:
    jboldoba TODO check whether lists are already removed TODO (potentially) apply the language identifier in order to discard noisy sentences

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description

      Creates a preprocessor without any page to preprocess.
      ArticleTextExtractor(java.util.Locale language, int year, java.io.File listOfPages)
      Creates a preprocessor with the pages listed in listOfPages.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ArticleTextExtractor

        public ArticleTextExtractor(java.util.Locale language,
                    int year)
        Creates a preprocessor without any page to preprocess. The root directory is set to the user's home.
        Parameters:
        language - Language of the Wikipedia
        year - Year of the dump of Wikipedia

      • ArticleTextExtractor

        public ArticleTextExtractor(java.util.Locale language,
                    int year,
                    java.io.File listOfPages)
                     throws java.io.IOException
        Creates a preprocessor with the pages listed in listOfPages. This file must have one ID by line. The root directory is set to the user's home.
        Parameters:
        language - Language of the Wikipedia
        year - Year of the dump of Wikipedia
        listOfPages - File with one page ID by line.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

                       WikiApiException

        Parameters:

        WikiApiException

      • loadPages

        public void loadPages(java.io.File list)
               throws java.io.IOException
        Loads all the page IDs of the file list. The older loaded pages are kept in the preprocessor.
        Parameters:
        list - File with one page ID by line.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • addPreprocess

        public void addPreprocess(TypePreprocess preprocess)
        Adds a new preprocess to the available ones. If preprocess is already added, nothing is done
        Parameters:
        preprocess - The new preprocess. It can't be a null object.

      • removePreprocess

        public boolean removePreprocess(TypePreprocess preprocess)
        Removes the preprocess if it belongs to the set of available preprocesses.
        Parameters:
        preprocess - Preprocess to remove.
        Returns:
        .

      • setRootDirectory

        public void setRootDirectory(java.io.File directory)
        Changes the root directory of the preprocessor. If directory isn't a valid directory (with writable permissions), any change is done.
        Parameters:
        directory - A valid directory.

      • isAvailablePreprocess

        public boolean isAvailablePreprocess(TypePreprocess preprocess)
        Query if exists the preprocess within the available preprocesses.
        Parameters:
        preprocess - Desired preprocess.
        Returns:
        if the desired preprocess is available.

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        Extract texts from Wikipedia articles and save them into text files, after some given preprocessing. The Wikipedia edition is defined with the language and year provided. Moreover, an output root directory is given to write the files.
        Parameters:
        args - language, year [file with ids]
